gameover.display: {text, select, gameover {Game Over} win {You Won!} loss {You lost} draw {Draw} cross {Cross Wins} circle {Circle Wins} other {Game Over}}

logs.error_codes: {code, select, error_code_1 {Session and room ID mismatch} error_code_2 {Match room not found} error_code_3 {Player not in match room} error_code_4 {Same account launched game from different device Reconnect if you prefer to use this device.} error_code_5 {Match Room Expired} other {Something went wrong}}
